speaker: COUNTESS
text: In delivering my son from me, I bury a second

speaker: COUNTESS
text: husband.

speaker: BERTRAM
text: And I in going, madam, weep o’er my

speaker: BERTRAM
text: father’s death anew; but I must attend his Majesty’s

speaker: BERTRAM
text: command, to whom I am now in ward, evermore

speaker: BERTRAM
text: in subjection.

speaker: LAFEW
text: You shall find of the King a husband, madam;

speaker: LAFEW
text: you, sir, a father. He that so generally is at all times

speaker: LAFEW
text: good must of necessity hold his virtue to you,

speaker: LAFEW
text: whose worthiness would stir it up where it wanted

speaker: LAFEW
text: rather than lack it where there is such abundance.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: What hope is there of his Majesty’s

speaker: COUNTESS
text: amendment?

speaker: LAFEW
text: He hath abandoned his physicians, madam,

speaker: LAFEW
text: under whose practices he hath persecuted time

speaker: LAFEW
text: with hope, and finds no other advantage in the

speaker: LAFEW
text: process but only the losing of hope by time.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: This young gentlewoman had a father—O,

speaker: COUNTESS
text: that “had,” how sad a passage ’tis!—whose skill

speaker: COUNTESS
text: was almost as great as his honesty; had it stretched

speaker: COUNTESS
text: so far, would have made nature immortal, and

speaker: COUNTESS
text: death should have play for lack of work. Would for

speaker: COUNTESS
text: the King’s sake he were living! I think it would be

speaker: COUNTESS
text: the death of the King’s disease.

speaker: LAFEW
text: How called you the man you speak of,

speaker: LAFEW
text: madam?

speaker: COUNTESS
text: He was famous, sir, in his profession, and it

speaker: COUNTESS
text: was his great right to be so: Gerard de Narbon.

speaker: LAFEW
text: He was excellent indeed, madam. The King

speaker: LAFEW
text: very lately spoke of him admiringly, and mourningly.

speaker: LAFEW
text: He was skillful enough to have lived still, if

speaker: LAFEW
text: knowledge could be set up against mortality.

speaker: BERTRAM
text: What is it, my good lord, the King languishes

speaker: BERTRAM
text: of?

speaker: LAFEW
text: A fistula, my lord.

speaker: BERTRAM
text: I heard not of it before.

speaker: LAFEW
text: I would it were not notorious.—Was this gentlewoman

speaker: LAFEW
text: the daughter of Gerard de Narbon?

speaker: COUNTESS
text: His sole child, my lord, and bequeathed to

speaker: COUNTESS
text: my overlooking. I have those hopes of her good

speaker: COUNTESS
text: that her education promises. Her dispositions she

speaker: COUNTESS
text: inherits, which makes fair gifts fairer; for where an

speaker: COUNTESS
text: unclean mind carries virtuous qualities, there

speaker: COUNTESS
text: commendations go with pity—they are virtues and

speaker: COUNTESS
text: traitors too. In her they are the better for their simpleness.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: She derives her honesty and achieves her

speaker: COUNTESS
text: goodness.

speaker: LAFEW
text: Your commendations, madam, get from her

speaker: LAFEW
text: tears.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: ’Tis the best brine a maiden can season her

speaker: COUNTESS
text: praise in. The remembrance of her father never

speaker: COUNTESS
text: approaches her heart but the tyranny of her sorrows

speaker: COUNTESS
text: takes all livelihood from her cheek.—No

speaker: COUNTESS
text: more of this, Helena. Go to. No more, lest it be

speaker: COUNTESS
text: rather thought you affect a sorrow than to have—

speaker: HELEN
text: I do affect a sorrow indeed, but I have it too.

text: Moderate lamentation is the right of the dead,

speaker: LAFEW

speaker: COUNTESS

text:
The
               
              King’s
               
              disease
              —
              my
               
              project
               
              may
               
              deceive
               
              me
              ,

speaker: HELEN
text:
But
               
              my
               
              intents
               
              are
               
              fixed
               
              and
               
              will
               
              not
               
              leave
               
              me
              .
